A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi really advances the newest trilogy forward. There are so many amazing moments that just make you want to clap\, and also moments that make you want to shed a tear. The cast was fantastic and I really can't wait for the next chapter to see what else unfolds. Still so many questions\, but yet some have been answered from The Force Awakens. I don't understand the negative ratings with this movie. Everyone really did a great job to say the very least.
